title: Generate modules/components
content:
• ng g c home
  • ng g c dashboard
  • ng g m todos
  • ng g c todos
  • ng g c todos/todo

title: Configure modules
content:
• Import `SharedModule` in `TodosModule` (feature module needs access to shared declarations)
  • Import `TodosModule` in `AppModule` (the app needs access to the feature)

title: Routing
content: Setup routing in `/app/app-routing.module.ts` by assigning HomeComponent to '' and DashboardComponent to 'dashboard'

title: Create Todo data model
content: Create `/app/todos/shared/todos.model.ts` with an exported interface called Todo

title: Implement Date Pipe
content: Visualize the creation date of the todo in a dutch format (dd-mm-yyyy) using Angular's built-in Date pipe.

title: Implement TodoComponent
content:
• Create `Todo` input binding
  • Implement the template
  • Identify the user interaction of the component and create EventEmitters for each
    • openContent
    • closeContent
    • Delete
  • Identify state that should be controlled by the parent
    • showContent

title: Render HTML in the content of a Todo
content:
Using `innerHTML` is a bad practice and a potential security risk.
  • Create a SafeHtml Directive in the SharedModule `ng g d shared/safe-html`
  • Implement Angular's DomSanitizer to strip potential harmful/unexpected HTML
  • From now on use `[rbSafeHtml]` instead of `[innerHTML]`

title: Implement TodosComponent
content:
• Create `Todo[] input binding
  • Implement the template by looping over todos with *ngFor and reference TodoComponent
  • Implement state for showing and hiding todo's content
    • Identify the user interaction of the component and create EventEmitters for each
    • deleteTodo

title: Dashboard
content:
• Inject `TodosService`
  • Fetch todos and pass it to the TodosComponent
  • Implement delete event of TodosComponent

title: Creating todo lanes (kanban style)
content: Separate the todos by creating 2 lanes for done and not done todos in the dashboard

title: Data streams (RxJS)
content: Rewrite the TodosService so that it supports multiple subscribers without triggering multiple calls
